subject: Re: 4.5 release candidate
msgSnippet: Certainly too late for 4.5 now, but I found the following issue: There seem to be now way to create an error reporting runner using public interfaces.
messageBody:
Certainly too late for 4.5 now, but I found the following issue:

There seem to be now way to create an error reporting runner using public interfaces.
Request.errorReport() is _depercated_ and refers to the _internal_ class
ErrorReportingRunner.

Otherwise, porting JExample from 4.4 to 4.5 was mainly a matter of renaming import
declarations. Now my custom runner uses public interfaces only, well done!

cheers,
AA
